commandHelp: Clears the terminal screen. Usage: clear
Decrypts an encrypted text using internal keys. Usage: decrypt <encryptedText>
Displays the list of accessible files in the system. Usage: files
Ends the current session and returns to the login prompt. Usage: logout
Opens the inbox to read received messages. Usage: mails
Opens the selected file. Usage: open <fileName>
Connects to a specific host. Usage: telnet <serverAddress>@<username>:<password>
Displays the current user identity. Usage: whoami
